pr_title: Allow forms to be edited after blank form deletion

timeline.message: Remove debugging code

timeline.author: lognaturel

replies.bodyText:
With the change lock we don't know which background service is running, but we know we shouldn't start the migration. I figured given these cases were rare it'd be ok to combine them into one error message?
The message should definitely change though. How about "Automatic jobs are running. Please try again later."?
replies.author: seadowg

replies.bodyText:
Whoops, this was a note to self I meant to come back to! But luckily you knew why I was confused.
Ok, I agree a single message is sufficient. I don't think that users know what "jobs" means in that context. How about "Automatic send or blank form download is running. Please try again later." You'll also need to change the resource name.
replies.author: lognaturel

timeline.bodyText: Ah, I see. Given this, I'll merge #3986 so you can clear out those commits here and not deal with merge conflicts.
timeline.author: lognaturel

timeline.message: Delete soft deleted forms when last instance deleted
Delete soft deleted forms when last instance deleted

timeline.bodyText: whenThereFillForms? When there are filled forms?
timeline.author: lognaturel

timeline.bodyText: this should be filled form list?
timeline.author: lognaturel

replies.bodyText: Again nice. Catch I think I was too focused on getting ...FormFrom... right in these cases haha
replies.author: seadowg

timeline.author: lognaturel

timeline.bodyText: Why not use getFormsCursor(String formId, String formVersion)? I think you may need some @NonNull annotations if you just do this.
timeline.author: lognaturel

replies.bodyText: Totally missed this was a thing. On one hand it feels like it might make sense to start reducing the number of methods on FormsDao and just write queries as much as possible in our new repos. I'll see how used the getFormsCursor(String formId, String formVersion) is and think about inlining it.
replies.author: seadowg

replies.bodyText: Actually going to avoid that method as it adds sorting in which we don't need here.
replies.author: seadowg

timeline.bodyText: These names are really reprehensible. Maybe another thing to note for v1.29 cleanup is going further down the line of the DeleteSavedFormActivity rename.
timeline.author: lognaturel

timeline.bodyText: Why not use constructor params? Seems catastrophic to not call this so why even make it possible?
timeline.author: lognaturel

timeline.bodyText: Why not use parameter args to guarantee these are set? This seems dangerous.
timeline.author: lognaturel

replies.bodyText: I was following the original structure which used setters to get the dependencies in. You're right though that we should improve on that while we're here!
replies.author: seadowg

timeline.bodyText: Previously, all of the data in the forms table could be recreated from a form definition except for the last detected hash. Now delete adds more state that can't be recreated. Still, the consequences of "undeleting" forms on downgrade are not very dire and we don't expect downgrade to be common so let's stick with this and not worry about it. (This is just a note to make the decision explicit to our future selves)
timeline.author: lognaturel

timeline.bodyText: I can't imagine how it would happen but technically this could throw a IllegalMonitorStateException. Maybe catch and ignore out of an abundance of caution?
timeline.author: lognaturel

replies.bodyText: Yeah I missed that in the docs. Thanks for pointing it out. Will add that in.
replies.author: seadowg

timeline.message: Add change lock to prevent background jobs or migrations running at the same time
Add test for deleting form
Only soft delete forms that still have instances on device
Only soft delete forms that have unsubmitted instances
Make sure form soft delete is aware of form versions
Handle null version cases for deleting forms
Use FormDeleter in match exactly sync
Revise locks so that auto send can run at the same time as auto update and match exactly
Allow viewing delete form's instances
Add tests for deleting instances
Delete soft deleted forms when last instance deleted
Hide experimental prefs in release version
Correct typos
Ignore run time exception coming out of unlock()
Move repos to constructor args in tasks
Optimize FormDeleter
Bubble sorting up to method name
Update background job error message
Update test
Update test
Allow null versions when querying instances
